New Records: Angola achieved their biggest ever Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) win with a 3-0 victory over Namibia
Key Match Events: Angola's goalkeeper Neblu received a red card after 17 minutes
Gelson Dala scored twice including a goal from a free kick
Namibia defender Lubeni Haukongo was sent off after two yellow cards
Post-Match Reflections: Angola celebrated their biggest win in the Cup of Nations
Namibia made their debut in the knockout rounds but couldn't capitalize on early chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Peace Stadium in Bouake
Angola will face the winners of the Nigeria vs Cameroon clash in the quarterfinals
